review:
What a treat!! Please go and order a curry. The best we had till now. The people were so nice and our dinner was absolutely perfect.
Do yourself a favor:)

The owner and the staff is very friendly and good at English and all of the evening we was laughing and talking with the waiters. The food was amazing and they are good to control the level of spice, me and my family are not...very good at spicy foods, so we told them and they mead the perfect meal for us.

Excellent food and service when you visit the restaurant  Wew Thawulla. We went there for dinner and got some very good local food. If you go there you will get the best service and food.

Best food in Sigirya
Try the Rotti with avokado and chicken
Or the  Deville with chiken
Sooo goood
The owner and staff is very kind, sweet and genuin. 
They make the food while you wait-very freshmade

Excellent food, nice atmosphere and friendly staff! 

We ordered Chicken Kotthu and Vegetable curry and rice. Everything was delicious. Thank you!

The most amazing food I have had so far in Sri Lanka! All the staff are so friendly and great with the kids! The food is so fresh and so full of flavour! They definitely take pride in their food and go out of their...way to make sure you are comfortable and happy with the service and food! Also kids score free desserts twice! Could eat here everyda way to make sure you are comfortable and happy with the service and food! Also kids score free desserts twice! Could eat here everyday!!
The best food we have had in Sri Lanka! All the food was freshly prepared! Amazing customer service cannot recommend highly enough!! Thank you!
Delicious food and very nice people! A lot of choices and great prices. We will come again! Nice experience
Very nice restaurant, tasty food and wonderful owners! I recommend this place to everyone, the best restaurant in Sigirya!

Absolutely beautiful food. Such a beautiful vibe, with gorgeous lights, atmosphere and food. The staff were so friendly and accommodating and the food just sensational! We even got yumy cocktails! Cannot recommend it enough... Go there!!!

The place was very good and also chef very friendly and amazing, me and my friend stayed 3 days in sigiriya we eat here everyday. Food so delicious and also drinks  too. Thank you very much for everything high recommended this place üòä

I totally recomend this restaurant in Sigiryia!
The owner was very thoughtfull, the food was delicious just like the natural juices.
The food and fresh juices here are fantastic, but what stands out the most is the exceptional and friendly service from everyone working!! Deliciois, fresh homecooked food. A must eat in sirigiya!
The stuff and the food are the best in whole and souround in sirigiya. I have tried many there and there is no better one! 100%
